TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ErrorWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart implements class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable
Public Class ErrorWebPart Inherits ProxyWebPart Implements ITrackingPersonalizable
type ErrorWebPart = class inherit ProxyWebPart interface ITrackingPersonalizable

summary.span: 如果尝试加载或创建动态 控件的新实例失败，则作为占位符插入网页。

span.span: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic control has failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由 Web 部件控件集用作无法添加到页面的控件的占位符。 The class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a control that could not be added to the page. 如果控件尝试在区域中加载或创建动态控件的新实例, 并且由于某种原因尝试失败, 则会调用方法, 并插入一个控件来代替失败的控件。If the control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the then calls the method, and inserts an control in place of the control that failed. 插入控件以保留以前存在的、用户控件上可能已存在的个性化设置状态信息。The control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users. 例如, 假设有一个具有可个性化属性的控件, 以便用户可以保存其自己的邮政编码, 然后在每次用户访问该页面时, 该控件都可以自动显示该邮政编码的天气信息。For example, suppose there is a control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page. 如果天气控件出现问题, 使其无法在特定请求过程中加载, 但页面的其余部分加载成功, 则用户为该控件保存的自定义个性化设置数据将在下一次将保存页面的 nalization 数据。If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved. 通过插入控件来代替失败的控件, 你可以通知用户发生了问题, 还提供了一种机制, 以便 Web 部件控件集在出现故障的控件上保留用户的个性化数据可以更正。By inserting the control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected. 类派生自类, 作为一些设计为其他类型的临时占位符的类型。The class derives from the class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types. 若要创建类的实例, 控件将使用其公共构造函数。To create an instance of the class, the control uses its public constructor. 构造函数要求向其传递失败的控件的几个详细信息, 例如 ID、控件的原始类型 (如果失败的控件是包装在对象中的服务器控件或用户控件)、指向控件的源文件的原始路径 (如果失败的控件是用户控件) 和对象 (如果存在) 的 ID。The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a object if present. 类具有一个名为的公共属性。 The class has a single public property called . 开发人员可以为此属性分配一个值, 该值将在插入控件时显示在网页中。Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted. 类有三个受保护的方法。The class has three protected methods. 方法从包含无法加载的控件的区域的对象中提取样式特征。 The method takes style characteristics from the object for the zone that contains the control that failed to load. 如果此对象中存在任何样式设置, 则方法会将这些设置应用于控件。If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the control. 方法设置控件上几个重要的继承属性, 以防止用户通过隐藏、最小化、编辑或导出控件或更改其值来对控件进行个性化设置。 The method sets several important inherited properties on the control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its value. 最后, 方法对属性中字符串的值进行编码, 以防止呈现问题或脚本攻击。Finally, the method encodes the value of the string in the property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.

para.span: 控件实际插入页面的条件相对较少, 尽管类可以继承自和扩展, 但很少有开发人员会发现这是非常重要的。

span.span: The conditions in which an control is actually inserted into a page are relatively rare, and although the class can be inherited from and extended, few developers will find this to be of great importance.

para.span: 要扩展此类的一个原因是, 如果要自定义控件的外观和行为, 则为。

span.span: One reason you might want to extend this class is if you want to customize the appearance and behavior of the control.

para.span: 例如, 可以重写方法, 并在控件上设置其他样式或其他属性, 而不是已设置的属性。

span.span: For example, you could override the method, and set additional style or other properties on the control, beyond those that are already set.

para.span: 若要要求控件使用自定义控件, 还必须从类继承并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中, 应将方法参数的值分配给自定义控件的属性, 因为该控件从多个其他位置调用此方法, 并且通常传入不同的错误消息值。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and often passes in a different error message value.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public ErrorWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Public Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
public: ErrorWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: originalID
param.span: 字符串，失败控件的控件 ID（不是唯一 ID）。

span.span: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.

param.span: 如果失败涉及一个 控件，则该 ID 是其子服务器控件的 ID。

span.span: If a control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 字符串，失败控件的 名称。

span.span: A string that is the name of the of the failed control.

param.span: 如果失败涉及一个 控件，则该类型名称是其子服务器控件的类型。

span.span: If a control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 字符串，包含用户控件的路径（如果失败涉及包含子用户控件的 控件）。

span.span: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 字符串，返回 控件的 ID（如果控件的加载或创建操作失败涉及该类型的控件）。

span.span: A string that returns the ID of a control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.

param.span: 不是从 基类继承的控件需要此参数。

span.span: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the base class.
Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在尝试加载或创建动态控件的实例失败时创建控件的新实例。 The control creates a new instance of the control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic control. 动态控件是以编程方式添加到页面的控件, 或者是从控件目录添加控件的用户, 而不是在网页标记中声明的静态控件。Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page. 方法只是创建基类的一个实例, 并向其传递包含有关失败控件的信息的四个参数。The method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddAttributesToRender(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: ，包含要呈现的 HTML 输出。

span.span: An that contains the HTML output to be rendered.

summary.span: 将特殊错误样式特性应用于插入页中代替另一个控件的 对象。

span.span: Applies special error style attributes to an object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法采用 在包含控件的区域的对象中定义的样式特征 (如果有)。 The method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the object for the zone that contains an control. 样式在呈现之前应用于控件。The styles are applied to the control prior to rendering.

para.span: 如果开发人员想要自定义应用 于控件的样式特征, 则可以在派生类中重写此方法。

span.span: This method can be overridden in a derived class, if developers want to customize the style characteristics that are applied to an control.

para.span: 若要要求控件使用自定义控件, 还必须从类继承并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中, 应将方法参数的值分配给自定义控件的属性, 因为该控件从多个其他位置调用此方法, 并且通常传入特定错误消息。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndLoadPersonalization() cil managed
abstract member EndLoadPersonalization : unit -> unit override this.EndLoadPersonalization : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在呈现之前设置 控件的几个重要属性，以防止用户能够对该控件进行个性化设置。

span.span: Sets several important properties on the control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在呈现控件之前设置其属性。 The method sets properties on an control before it is rendered. 这些属性阻止用户隐藏、最小化、编辑或导出控件, 或更改其值。These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its value. 但是, 用户可以关闭或删除控件实例。However, users can close or delete an control instance.

para.span: 可以在继承的控件中重写此方法。

span.span: This method can be overridden in an inherited control.

para.span: 开发人员可能希望重写方法以设置控件的其他属性, 例如默认属性值。

span.span: Developers might want to override the method to set additional properties on the control, such as a default property value.

para.span: 若要要求控件使用自定义控件, 还必须从类继承并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中, 应将方法参数的值分配给自定义控件的属性, 因为该控件从多个其他位置调用此方法, 并且通常传入特定错误消息。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

member this.ErrorMessage : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置错误信息，该错误信息显示在网页中代替未能成功添加到该页的控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.

value.span: 包含错误信息文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the error message.

value.span: 默认值为特定于区域性的错误信息。

span.span: The default value is a culture-specific error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开发人员可以为 属性分配一个值,以便在控件插入到页面中的位置显示自定义错误消息。The property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the control is inserted into a page.

para.span: 开发人员可以通过在构造函数中或在重写的方法中, 将默认值分配给属性, 来为属性分配默认值。

span.span: Developers can assign a default value to the property by extending the class and, in the constructor or in an overridden method, assigning a default value to the property.

para.span: 若要要求控件使用自定义控件, 还必须从类继承并重写其方法。

span.span: To require the control to use a custom control, you must also inherit from the class and override its method.

para.span: 在该方法中, 应将方法参数的值分配给自定义控件的属性, 因为该控件从多个其他位置调用此方法, 并且通常传入特定错误消息。

span.span: In that method, you should assign the value of the method's parameter to the property of your custom control, because the control calls this method from several other places, and usually passes in a specific error message.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 对 属性的字符串值进行编码。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对赋给属性的字符串进行编码, 以确保其正确呈现, 并防范脚本注入攻击。 The method encodes the string assigned to the property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
